title: Calaça de Viveiros (Cónego Henrique)
body: He founded the monastery of Incarnation by a vow he made if Portugal were to be liberated from the Castilian yoke. He died at the age of 73 on May 25, 1662. In the seminary library, there was a life-size portrait of Cónego Calaça.

Cónego Henrique: Founder of the monastery of Incarnation by a vow he made if Portugal were to be liberated from the Castilian yoke.
